Thurs., Jan 25: Help celebrate and protect reproductive freedom.
  


45th Anniversary Celebration of Roe v. Wade

Thursday, Jan. 25, 5:30-7:30 p.m.
Grappone Conference Center
70 Constitution Ave.
Concord, NH 03301

Purchase Tickets
Share this:           

Greetings ##first_name[ACLU Supporter]##,

Join us on Thursday, January 25 for the 45th Anniversary Celebration of Roe v. Wade! Enjoy a cocktail reception with appetizers and a cash bar as we honor the activists, advocates and supporters who helped secure the constitutional right for women to control their own bodies.

Tickets are $40 per person. A special price of $15 is available to students and people with limited income.

This event is presented by the NH Reproductive Rights Advisory Council and sponsored by the ACLU of New Hampshire.

We hope to see you there!

Civilly yours,

Paul Racioppi
Development Director
